column5: HOWDY Y'ALL! DETAILED DIRECTIONS ARE LISTED IN THE LOCATION SECTION FOR THOSE AMAZING GUESTS WHOM HAVE USED INSTANT BOOKING!  This room is an amazing quiet oasis in South Austin from you wonderful music and incredible sights that you will see in Austin. You will enjoy a private bedroom (10 inch foam queen size mattress in a four post bed) with a walk-in closet located a quiet South Austin neighborhood includes continental breakfast, Apple TV & wireless internet service.
